meanings.definition: Having the power to influence or affect others.
meanings.sent1: The popular book was written by influentials authors.
meanings.sent2: She is one of the most influentials people in our community.
meanings.sent3: The influentials cat convinced the dog to share its toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as influentials as a ray of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The influentials music touched the hearts of everyone who listened.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that has the power to influence or affect others.
meanings.sent1: The influentials in the company always get their ideas heard.
meanings.sent2: Celebrities are often seen as influentials in society.
meanings.sent3: The influentials banana in the fruit bowl seemed to be giving advice to the apples.
meanings.sent4: His words were like magic spells cast by an influentials wizard.
meanings.sent5: The influentials of her leadership was felt by all who worked with her.
